about_the_game:
This DLC contains 3 brand new tenants, in addition to the single CG, it will additionally unlock multiplayer CGs with other tenants!

1. JianQing

A rising star of athletics. Although unknown in the past, but began to show the results of training last year, often in the field to win excellent results, get a lot of attention; this is due to the high school coach's discerning eye to discover, so she respects him.

2.Maje

A lively college freshman who is trying to make the most of her youth. She moved here alone from the remote countryside for the convenience of schooling. She has a longing for everything in the city and thinks this is the place of her dreams.

3. Xinci

A new nurse practitioner who works in a large hospital in the city. She is a conscientious and patient nurse who is well received by the patients and deserves the name of "angel in white". She treats the red poodles "Champagne" at home like her own child, and lives with her.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages, or for viewing in the workplace.
・Alcohol
・Nudity
・Bondage
・hypnosis
・Oral sex
・Sexual innuendo
・Sexual acts
・Multi-sexual intercourse
・Non-consensual intercourse
・Strong language

All characters in this story are 18 years of age or older.

This DLC contains 3 brand new tenants, in addition to the single CG, it will additionally unlock multiplayer CGs with other tenants!

1. JianQing

A rising star of athletics. Although unknown in the past, but began to show the results of training last year, often in the field to win excellent results, get a lot of attention; this is due to the high school coach's discerning eye to discover, so she respects him.

A lively college freshman who is trying to make the most of her youth. She moved here alone from the remote countryside for the convenience of schooling. She has a longing for everything in the city and thinks this is the place of her dreams.

3. Xinci

A new nurse practitioner who works in a large hospital in the city. She is a conscientious and patient nurse who is well received by the patients and deserves the name of "angel in white". She treats the red poodles "Champagne" at home like her own child, and lives with her.
name: Secret Camera Tenant Pack1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz dual-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 280 / Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3400G / Intel Core i7-4930K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 / Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
